msbt.message: Hey! I found something super neat in my cereal this morning. It's a DIY recipe for a Bunny Day crown!Here, you can have it. Justread around the milk stains and the cereal crumbs.
I wonder if there are any more recipes I'm gonna go looking after snack time, !
Oh! You don't have enough room in your pockets!No problem! Go clear some pocket space and come back. I'll find some ants to hang out with, .
Look! Some bugs brought me a DIY recipe for a Bunny Day bag. Aren't they the best? Here, take it.
Bugs are so thoughtful. I'm gonna go find some eggs so I can make a Bunny Day bag too, !
Huh? Um Did you know your pockets are full, ?Well, the bugs were nice to me, so I wanna be nice to you. Go make some pocket space and come back, OK?
Guess what? I was digging in my couch, and I found a whooole lotta !A WHOLE lot. But now I'm bored of the taste, and I don't know what to do with 'em, so, um Here! Have 5!
I wonder if anyone else wants some. I'm gonna go ask around!
Oh! Your pockets are full. Sooo, uh this is awkward. Can you maybe go make some space and come back?
